𐘾 KA 𓊖 kar 𒆠 ki 𔗜 ku 𜐺 KU 𐘾 ka 𐀏 KA 𑁣 керла 𔕆 •KAR 𔕈 KA 𔕇 𐀤 𐘿 QE Ⱆ Uku 𒉽 KUR₂ 𒄯 Ḫar 𓊖 [1] 𒃸 kár 𒃼 gar

𐀏 #ka •kar •car 𐊨 ʘ q /kʷ/ => Letters 𐊴 /k̂/ 𐊛 /c/ @ Carian

𐀺-𐀏 wo-ka vehicle, chariot

𐀀-𐀏-𐀲-𐀍 a-ka-ta-jo à Korta by the coast

𒄒 kibᵃ 𐀏𐀡 ka-po 𓂧 𓄿 𓃀 καρπός karpós "fruit"

𐀏 -ka 𓂓 -ger male suffix > er 𓀂

𐀷-𐀙-𐀏 wa-na-ka ᴷWanax (King) ἄναξ ἄνακτα
𐀷-𐀙-𐀭 wa-na-sa ᴷVanessa (Königin, Queen)

𐀏 car because in 𐀁𐀚𐀏 e-ne-ka ένεκα denn car because of

𐀏𐀨 care > κλα clé "key" ! λ
